name: Pinboard - Blush (Pretty in Pinks)
description:
Based on style 54881 by user 120170.
(Which itself was based on style 41551 by user 78339.)

So, from someone who doesn't know a lick of CSS but just had to respond to this tweet https://twitter.com/#!/Pinboard/status/124234873832603648, here is Pinboard in Pink.
